tasks.label: build:asm+cpp (MinGW)
tasks.command: nasm -f win64 multiply.asm -o multiply.obj && g++ -std=c++17 -O2 main.cpp multiply.obj -o mul.exe

tasks.label: test
tasks.command: nasm -f win64 multiply.asm -o multiply.obj && g++ -std=c++17 -O2 test_multiply.cpp multiply.obj -o test_mul.exe && .\test_mul.exe
